text: Petar Ratkov (; born 18 August 2003) is a Serbian footballer. He plays as a centre-forward for Red Bull Salzburg. ==Career== Ratkov started his career at TSC Baƒçka Topola. In February 2021 he was in the professional squad of TSC for the first time. He played his first professional match in the SuperLiga in March 2021 against FK Red Star Belgrade. By the end of the 2020/21 season he had made nine appearances in thehighest league. In the 2021/22 season he played 31 games in which he scored three times. He finished runners-up with TSC in the 2022/23 season. In this season hewas the club's top scorer with 13 goals in 36 appearances. On 18 June 2023, Ratkov signed for reigning Austrian Bundesliga champions Red Bull Salzburg on a five-year contract. On 23 July 2023 he made his debut for Salzburg in the Austrian Cup match versus SPG Ardagger/Viedorf. ==International== Ratkov made his debut for Serbia U-19s in October 2021. He also took part in the EM in 2022, where he played in all three games and scored one goal.
